graph_title: The share of families receiving family benefits to households
indicator_name: The share of families receiving family benefits to households
national_indicator_description: In the indicator it is reflected the share of families receiving family allowance from the total number of households.
computation_definitions: State benefit is regular or one-time financial assistance provided from the state budget.
computation_calculations: The ratio of families receiving family allowance to households.
source_organisation_2: Ministry of Labour and Social Affaires of RA
